page.title: 02AIREDALE HOSPITAL: WARD 17
page.content: {Ward 17}is a children's ward in Airedale hospital.The patients sleep in rooms with four beds in them and beside each bed is a cupboard to put clothes in and a bedside table with a radio and a button to press if you want the nurses.The dinners come on a trolley and the patients can pick what they want off the trolley. There is another trolley with medicines and tablets on it which has locked doors and the sister has the key.On one side of the ward there is a row of cupboards which are used to keep laundry and toys in them.There are no fixed times for visitors in the children's ward but if people do come they have to come between 11am and 6.45pm.At the end of the ward there is a store room.{(written by Paul {Edmonson aged ten).}
